banner.info.guests.capacity: Pricing for {{ numberOfGuests }} guests. This venue can accommodate up to {{ maxNumberOfGuests }} guests.
banner.warning.guests.capacity.TooHigh: The pricing shown is for {{ numberOfGuests }} guests but this venue can only hold {{ maxNumberOfGuests }} guests. <anchor>Edit guests</anchor>
banner.warning.guests.capacity.TooLow: The pricing shown is for {{ numberOfGuests }} guests but this venue has a minimum guest requirement of {{ minNumberOfGuests }} guests. <anchor>Edit guests</anchor>
contact.text: Get in touch with the venue asap!
contact.title: Match your budget?
entryPoint.description: Get a price estimate here on Bridebook before you reach out to {{name}}. Easily compare dates and guest numbers.
entryPoint.title: Check if it’s a budget match!
form.budget.description: This helps us show how this venue fits your overall budget — it won't affect the quotes
form.budget.hint: Most couples spend about 60% of their total wedding budget on the venue + catering combined. But feel free to spend more or less to fit your plans!
form.budget.title: Confirm your total wedding budget (venue + everything else)
form.common.value.number: The value must be a number
form.dates.title: Select the dates you would like to compare
form.dates.year.unavailableTooltip: This venue does not have pricing available for all years. Even if it’s not your exact wedding date, the available prices should give you a helpful guide to expected costs.
form.guests.placeholder: Enter your estimated number of guests
form.guests.required: The value must be greater than 0
form.guests.title: Confirm your number of guests
priceAndPackages.addBudgetTooltip.phrase: This helps us show how this venue fits your overall budget —it won't affect the quotes.
Most couples spend about 60% of their total wedding budget on the venue + catering combined. But feel free to spend more or less to fit your plans!
priceAndPackages.budgetTooltip.estimate: Based on this and your total wedding budget of {{budget}},  your recommended spend is <bold>{{budgetEstimate}}</bold>.
priceAndPackages.budgetTooltip.packageTy: Couples typically spend {{percentageVenueAndCatering}}% of their total wedding budget on the venue + catering combined ({{percentageCatering}}% for catering and {{percentageVenue}}% for the venue dry hire).
priceAndPackages.infoText1: These are AI-generated price estimates based on this venue's latest brochures.
priceAndPackages.infoText2: For an official quote, message the venue.
priceAndPackages.title: Prices & Packages
tips.section.title: Budgeting tips
tips.tip1.description: Couples often save up to 25% by being flexible with their date.
tips.tip1.title: Try an off-peak month of the year
tips.tip2.description: Weddings on weekdays cost typically 20% less than weekends.
tips.tip2.title: Book Monday - Thursday
tips.tip3.description: Consider having some of them as evening guests to reduce costs.
tips.tip3.title: Food and drink for your guests can get expensive
tips.tip4.description: But don't forget to ask the venue about corkage fees!
tips.tip4.title: Bringing your own alcohol can reduce costs if possible
tips.tip5.description: Plan a later ceremony, leading straight into the evening party.
tips.tip5.title: Opt for a "Twilight" wedding
tips.tip6.description: Especially for off-peak or weekday wedding dates.
tips.tip6.title: Couples often save 15 to 50% on the standard fees
